Text: Ive landed againApologies for the mass email I know many of you are thinking that you received an email message from me to this effect not too long ago But a good opportunity presented itself and Ive just started w Duke Energy in their Risk Management group Needless to say I hit the ground running and am starting my second week Its an exciting project where were working to develop a corporate wide risk management system My new email is and you can also reach me at Rudy Elizondo
psAs always you can continue to use to reach me Rudy
